article_title: Two NYPD Officers Seriously Hurt in Brooklyn Fire
article_text:
Two New York City police officers were critically injured Sunday afternoon in a fire at a Coney Island apartment high-rise, police and fire officials said.

The officers—Dennis Guerra, 38 years old, and Rosa Rodriguez, 36—were overcome by smoke after getting out of the elevator on the 13th floor of the 18-story Unity Tower on Surf Avenue, Police...
